DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Stamp Kit (Set of 34 Stamps)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Stamp Kit contains a wide selection of specially designed EVA stamps from Snazaroo packaged in one box. The stamps are approximately one and a half inches at the widest point and are perfect for the average sized child cheek. They are one inch thick and are easy to use even for beginner users.
Includes the following designs: Alien, Baseball, Basketball, Bat, Black Cat, Bear, Butterfly, Skull & Crossbones, Brontosaurus, Bunny, Candy Cane, Clown, Crown, Dolphin, Eagle, Egg, Fairy 2, Fish, Flag, Football, Heart, Kitten, Ladybug, Lion, Panda, Paw, Peace, Pumpkin, Puppy, Reindeer, Skull, Smile Face, Spider and Unicorn.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use specially engineered EVA stamps
From the renowned Face Painting product manufacturer in the world
